Summary Note:
The RM has known Elisabetta Benedetta Leonardi since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Having worked for over 29 years, Elisabetta Benedetta Leonardi brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, she chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Elisabetta Benedetta Leonardi and Belli tied the knot in 2001. Together they have 1 kid called Celli.
Education Background:
Elisabetta finished secondary school at Istituto Tecnico Industriale Alessandro Volta Torino in 1992.
After that, she went on to study at University of Naples Federico II until 1997.
Occupation History:
Elisabetta Benedetta Leonardi is a seasoned professional with over 29 years of experience.
At Versace S.p.A., Elisabetta Benedetta Leonardi held the position of Assistant Designer from 1996 to 2000, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Senior Designer at Giorgio Armani S.p.A. in 2000, further expanding her skill set.
At Giorgio Armani S.p.A., she worked as a Creative Director from 2002 to 2007, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
After 11 years of dedication, she assumed the role of Founder/Designer at Versace S.p.A. in 2009, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 670000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She owns house in Treviso, where she resides. It is worth 1350000 EUR.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns house in Verona worth 1395000 EUR.

Moreover, she has invested in additional property in Siena, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The villa is valued at 2050000 EUR.

She inherited 530000 EUR from her mother, a well-known Neurosurgeon, in 2009, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
